import React, { Component } from 'react' import SelectFilter from './select' import AddArticle from './addArticle' import toggleDecorator from '../decorators/toggleDecorator' import logo from '../logo.svg' import ToggleCreate from './toggleCreate' import ToggleSelect from './toggleSelect' class Header extends Component { render(){ const { toggleOpenAdd, toggleOpenSelect, isOpenSelect, isOpenAdd } = this.props return(

FOR THE VOICE

1910-1920

FOR THE VOICE

AVANGARD RUSSIAN BOOK

ASSOCIATIONS, GROUPS AND PUBLISHING HOUSES

{!isOpenAdd && }
{!isOpenSelect && }
{this.openAdd } {this.openSelect}
) } get openSelect(){ return( this.state.isOpenSelect ? : null ) } get openadd(){ return( this.state.isOpenAdd ? : null ) } } export default toggleDecorator(Header)
